alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hamilton, southwestern Merrick and Hall Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cairo, or 12 miles west of Grand Island, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alda around 555 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grand Island, Phillips and Chapman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
